review: Yay a little stick that you can plug into any HDMI port and get amazon video on......no wait you have to plug it into a power source, even on my Smart LG TV the usb port is apparently not good enough....oh and then it only actualy works on Hitachi, JVC, LG, Mitsubishi, NEC, Panasonic, Philips, Pioneer, Samsung, Sharp, Sony, Toshiba, Vizio, and Westinghouse..... Does not work on all TVs that support 1080P/720P 50/60hz on HDMI such as my 2nd TV I bought this for which is an Apex.
